name: Geiger Counter PRO
description:
Cool fun Geiger Counter for Android Devices. Check out youtube video! Phone rotation/pitch determines dose.

**NEW** Choose metal detector in main menu. This will increase metered radiation if metal objects (like screw drivers, batteries, magnets ...) are very close at the phone. Please watch youtube video for correct usage.

Analog Design from real CD V-717 Civil Defense Remote Gamma Survey Meter
